title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
OB: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: When resizing the window in the vertical direction, the flashing of the tabs in the TabFolder and Frames should be minimized or eliminated.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the control example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only.
3. Observe the excessive flashing of the tabs in the TabFolder and Frames.
